shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.guide: Due to browser policy restrictions, the extension cannot open the shortcut settings page directly. Please copy and paste the following address into the address bar to set up your shortcuts.
shortcuts.guide_firefox: For Firefox, navigate to gear icon → Manage Extension Shortcuts; Shortcuts only work when the browser is focused.

cache.title: Resource Cache
cache.cache_enabled: Resources cached locally for faster history

sound.title: Sound Settings
sound.description: Select the sound to use when pushing notifications, leave blank to use system default
sound.description_2: Click the play icon to test the sound effect

avatar.url_invalid: Invalid avatar URL, please check and try again
avatar.url_help: Please enter a valid and stable image URL, leave blank to use NoLet's app icon, supporting PNG / JPG formats

favicon.title: API Settings
favicon.enable_help: When enabled, notifications will display website icons for clearer context.
favicon.api_url_help: This feature is off by default. You can enable or disable it anytime.
favicon.api_url_help_2: How it works: The extension only extracts the domain part of a URL and uses a proxy server to fetch the public icon. If you still have privacy concerns, you can switch to another favicon service (third-party).
favicon.api_url_help_3: For more details, please see the official Q&A and Privacy Policy.
favicon.save_failed: Failed to save website icon settings

encryption.title: Encryption Settings
encryption.tips_on: Please note that it is consistent with the first item of the NoLet app algorithm configuration list

api_v2.title: Enable API v2
api_v2.update_success: API v2 enabled, now you can use all parameters.

advanced_params.success_message: You have enabled the full parameter configuration, you can set more parameters on the send page.
advanced_params.reset_message: You have disabled the full parameter configuration, the parameter settings have been reset

speed_mode.warning_description: After enabling Speed Mode, clicking the extension icon will directly enter the Speed Mode interface instead of the regular push interface.
speed_mode.feature_2: Send to default device after countdown {{countdown}}s
speed_mode.feature_3: Click the input box to pause sending and manually edit content
speed_mode.requirements: You can right-click the extension icon to disable
speed_mode.save_failed: Failed to save Speed Mode settings

dns_query.title: DNS Query
dns_query.help: This feature helps you diagnose network issues. You can query NoLet’s official DNS records here and compare them with your local ping test results. If they don’t match, it may indicate DNS poisoning. To fix this, you can add the correct IP address to your device’s hosts file, or configure DoH service in your browser.
dns_query.pollution_warning: Different DNS providers returned different IP addresses, possible DNS pollution detected.
dns_query.pollution_suggestion: It is recommended to select a trusted IP address and add it to the hosts file.
dns_query.hosts_guide_windows_step3: 3. Add at the end of file: IP_address domain
dns_query.hosts_guide_unix_step3: 3. Add at the end of file: IP_address domain
dns_query.doh_guide_intro: Configure DoH service in your browser:
dns_query.doh_chrome_step1: 1. Click the menu button (⋮) in the top right corner and select "Settings".
dns_query.doh_chrome_step2: 2. In the Settings page, click "Privacy and security" on the left side.
dns_query.doh_chrome_step3: 3. Scroll to the "Security" section and find "Use secure DNS" option.
dns_query.doh_chrome_step4: 4. Enable "Use secure DNS" and select "With custom provider".
dns_query.doh_chrome_step5: 5. In the provider field, enter: https://doh.pub/dns-query
dns_query.doh_firefox_step1: 1. Click the menu button (☰) in the top right corner and select "Settings".
dns_query.doh_firefox_step2: 2. In the Settings page, click "Privacy & Security" on the left side.
dns_query.doh_firefox_step3: 3. Scroll to the "DNS over HTTPS" section.
dns_query.doh_firefox_step6: 6. In the input box that appears, enter: https://doh.pub/dns-query

providers.tencent_desc: Tencent Public DNS, fast access in China
providers.aliyun_primary_desc: Alibaba Cloud Public DNS primary server (223.5.5.5)
providers.aliyun_secondary_desc: Alibaba Cloud Public DNS secondary server (223.6.6.6)
providers.cloudflare_desc: Cloudflare Public DNS with global CDN acceleration

messages.batch_failed: All DNS providers failed to query

push.clipboard_empty: Clipboard is empty or contains no valid content

recall.button2: Due to the limited support for batch message recall by NoLet, this function cannot guarantee successful recall. Please pay attention to future updates.

url_dialog.title: Select content to send
url_dialog.info: Since this page cannot be parsed, please click the option above to confirm the content to send

advanced_params.title: Modify Parameters
advanced_params.tips_1: For sound and encrypted parameters, tap "Settings" in the bottom navigation.
advanced_params.tips_2: Modified parameters are shown as tabs at the bottom. Tap to navigate, or right-click to reset.
advanced_params.tips_3: Tap to jump to a parameter | Right-click to restore default
advanced_params.tips_4: Some parameters need to be combined, for example: volume needs to be combined with critical, active, and time-sensitive levels to take effect.
advanced_params.tips_5: All custom settings will be remembered automatically on the "Push" page and remain effective next time!

encryption.iv_description: Example random IV generation only, actual sending uses random values

backup.title: Backup / Restore
backup.backup_description: Export current configuration to local file
backup.authorize_description: Please authorize Google Drive access to use cloud sync function
backup.authorize_status_failed: Google Drive access is not authorized
backup.authorize_failed: Authorization failed, please confirm you are installing from the Chrome Web Store: {{message}}

cloud_backup_dialog.title: Backup to Google Drive
cloud_backup_dialog.description: You can choose to encrypt the backup file to protect sensitive information, or directly backup to Google Drive.

cloud_restore_dialog.title: Restore from Google Drive
cloud_restore_dialog.description: Select the backup file you want to restore, click on a file to start the restore process.
cloud_restore_dialog.no_files: No backup files found in Google Drive
cloud_restore_dialog.confirm_clear_all_message: Are you sure you want to delete all files in the backup folder? There are currently {{count}} backup files. This action cannot be undone.
cloud_restore_dialog.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this backup file? This action cannot be undone.

restore_dialog.confirm_description: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? The restore operation will overwrite all current configurations.
restore_dialog.encrypted_description: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? The restore operation will overwrite all current configurations.
restore_dialog.decrypt_failed: Unable to decrypt, please check if the password is correct
restore_dialog.drag_json_file: Please drag a JSON format backup file

backup_dialog.title: Encryption Required?
backup_dialog.description_line1: Backup includes: Device Key and encryption keys and other sensitive information.
backup_dialog.description_line2: You can choose to encrypt the backup file to protect this sensitive information, or directly backup in plain text.

backup.gd_sync_tips_1: After authorization, a folder named "NoLet Sender Backups" will be created in the root directory of your Google Drive. All operations will be performed inside this folder.
backup.gd_sync_tips_2: You can also download backup files from Google Drive at any time and restore them in Local Sync.
